c0mbat Product Documentation¶

Introduction¶

1. General Introduction¶

c0mbat is a Configuration Management tool developed as part of a screening exercise by Slack.

c0mbat is short for Zero-Configuration Management and Build Automorphic Tool.

2. Product¶

c0mbat is primarily intended for massive Cloud Infrastructures.
